text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Regulated Professions (Health and 
Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (Commencement of Certain Provisions) 
Order 2021.

text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2020” means the Regulated Professions (Health 

and Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 16 of 2020).
text_norm: 2 order act 2020 mean regulated profession (health social care) (amendment) act 2020 (no 16 2020)

title: Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (Commencement of Certain Provisions)
heading: 3. The 10th day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
3. The 10th day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which section 
101 of the Act of 2020, in so far as it relates to the insertion, in section 50A of 
the Medical Practitioners Act 2007, of subsections (3) and (4), shall come into 
operation.
text_norm: 3 10th day february 2021 appointed day section 101 act 2020 far relates insertion section 50a medical practitioner act 2007 subsection (3) (4) shall come operation

title: Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (Commencement of Certain Provisions)
heading: 4. The 13th day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
4. The 13th day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which the 

following provisions of the Act of 2020 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

sections 51 and 52; 

(b) 

section 53 (other than paragraph (a)); 

(c) 

sections 54 to 57; 

(d) 

section 59; 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

(i) 

section 61 (other than paragraph (b)); 

section 62 other than - 

(i) 

paragraph (a)(ii) in so far as that paragraph relates to the 
insertion, in subsection (1) of section 36 of the Pharmacy 
Act 2007, of paragraph (ba)(ii), and 

(ii) paragraph (b); 

sections 63 to 73; 

section 74 (other than paragraph (d)); 

sections 75 and 76. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [54] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 February, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (Commencement of Certain Provisions)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints the 10th day of February 2021 as the day on which certain 
(Health and Social Care) 
provisions of 
(Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 16 of 2020) come into operation. These 
provisions, which amend the Medical Practitioners Act 2007, relate to 
registration on the Supervised Division of the Medical Council’s Register. 

the Regulated Professions 

The Order also appoints the 13th day of February 2021 as the day on which 
certain provisions which amend the Pharmacy Act 2007 come into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [54] 5
